meanings.definition: A collection of literary works or passages chosen by the compiler.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading anthologies of short stories.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a wide selection of anthologies.
meanings.sent3: The anthology of poems made me laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an anthology of memories, each one carefully selected.
meanings.sent5: The anthology of fairy tales was like a treasure trove of imagination.

meanings.definition: A collection of selected writings by various authors.
meanings.sent1: She borrowed an anthology of essays from the library.
meanings.sent2: Anthologies are popular among literature enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The anthology of recipes was a delicious read.
meanings.sent4: His life story was an anthology of experiences, each chapter unique.
meanings.sent5: The anthology of historical documents provided a glimpse into the past.
